product_name: AMC AMC Guide to Outdoor Digital Photography: Creating Great Nature and Adventure Photos
long_description: The. Author: Jerry Monkman. Presents case studies and visual examples of described techniques as well as additional resources for further explanations. Softcover; 174 pages; color photographs. Appalachian Mountain Club Books; copyright 2011. Provides comprehensive coverage of the principles and process of photography. Offers tips and tricks for shooting in all weather conditions, including snow and rain, without compromising comfort or safety.
short_description: The AMC Guide to Outdoor Digital Photography takes you from choosing equipment and understanding terminology to mastering advanced technique when documenting your outdoor adventures.
